projects.title: Projects
projects.pacto.title: Pacto: Smart Contract Management with Blockchain
projects.pacto.description_1: Pacto is a web platform that simplifies the creation, signing, and management of smart contracts. It uses blockchain technology to automate contractual flows, offering security and decentralization.
projects.pacto.description_2: It drastically reduces the time required to complete a contract flow compared to traditional methods, ensuring secure and automated management.
projects.mobile_academic.title: Mobile Academic Management
projects.mobile_academic.description_1: Mobile Academic Management is an Android mobile application designed to optimize academic management. It allows students and teachers to control subjects, record attendance with QR scanning, and view grades.
projects.mobile_academic.description_2: This tool efficiently automates academic control, improving student data traceability and reducing manual management time.
projects.cultivo_sano.title: Cultivo Sano: Plant Disease Detection
projects.cultivo_sano.description_1: Cultivo Sano is an iOS mobile application that uses computer vision for early and accurate detection of plant diseases. It empowers rural communities by offering fast and reliable diagnoses, improving crop health.
projects.cultivo_sano.description_2: It integrates a robust detection model trained with over 10,000 images, achieving 87% accuracy and reducing diagnosis time by 60% compared to traditional methods, with efficient on-device processing.
projects.iot_monitoring.title: Smart Temperature Monitoring with IoT
projects.iot_monitoring.description_1: This IoT system monitors temperature in real-time and sends automated WhatsApp alerts when critical thresholds are exceeded. It allows supervising industrial processes (e.g., chocolate) and optimizing production.
projects.iot_monitoring.description_2: By preventing overheating and reducing non-productive time, this system increases operational availability and efficiency in manufacturing environments.
projects.cine_series_hub.title: Cine & Series Hub
projects.cine_series_hub.description_1: Cine & Series Hub is a mobile application that integrates the TMDb API to explore movies and series. It offers a favorites system, intuitive navigation, and a responsive design for a fluid user experience.
projects.cine_series_hub.description_2: It optimizes performance with efficient network consumption handling, reducing loading time and increasing user retention in pilot tests.
projects.inclusive_reservation.title: Inclusive Real-time Booking Web Platform
projects.inclusive_reservation.descripti: This web platform offers a real-time booking system with service profiles, portfolios, anonymous ratings, and automatic SMS and email reminders.
Its inclusive design ensures full accessibility for users with visual or motor limitations, improving usability and booking success rate.
projects.sms_encryption.title: SMS Encryption using RSA and SSL/TLS Analysis
projects.sms_encryption.description_1: This Android messaging application offers secure SMS communications using RSA encryption. It ensures message privacy and authentication, with storage backed by Firebase.
projects.sms_encryption.description_2: It optimizes decryption performance by implementing RSA-CRT, ensuring real-time security and tripling processing speed.
projects.ml_travel_prediction.title: Travel Cancellation Prediction using Machine Learning
projects.ml_travel_prediction.descriptio: This Machine Learning system predicts travel cancellations. It analyzes historical data and extracts temporal features to offer accurate predictions on cancellation probability.
It helps optimize reservation management by identifying patterns and risks, enabling more informed decision-making.
projects.parking_system.title: Parking Management System
projects.parking_system.description_1: This parking management system optimizes parking space availability in real-time. It allows users to locate and reserve spaces, integrating geolocation and map services for easy navigation.
projects.parking_system.description_2: It significantly reduces parking search time and increases space occupancy, improving overall campus efficiency.
projects.cancer_support_app.title: Support Application for Oncology Patients
projects.cancer_support_app.description_: This multi-platform mobile application offers personalized emotional support to oncology patients. It integrates an AI-powered chatbot to provide companionship and resources, serving as an innovative support tool.
It was selected to be part of medical students' thesis, highlighting its impact and relevance in the healthcare field.
projects.sql_transaction_system.title: SQL Transaction Management System
projects.sql_transaction_system.descript: This transaction management system with a graphical interface optimizes database operations. It supports a high volume of transactions per hour, ensuring data integrity and efficient processing.
It reduces processing times and guarantees high data integrity, making it a robust solution for high-transaction environments.
projects.super_mario_bros.title: Super Mario Bros (Recreation)
projects.super_mario_bros.description_1: Super Mario Bros is a retro platformer game that recreates the classic experience of the original. It offers dynamic level design and responsive controls for authentic and fun gameplay.
projects.super_mario_bros.description_2: It evokes the nostalgia of the classic Mario Bros experience with a modern implementation in C#.
projects.vending_machine_logic.title: Vending Machine Logic (VHDL)
projects.vending_machine_logic.descripti: This project implements the control logic for a vending machine. It uses VHDL and digital circuits to process coin payments and dispense products.
It ensures a high success rate in simulations, demonstrating the reliability of the design for automated machine operation.
projects.stemify.title: STEMify: STEM Career Guidance
projects.stemify.description: iOS mobile app guiding youth towards STEM careers through guided curiosity, gamification, and role model inspiration. Features university geolocation, web scraping, and custom flows.
experience.title: Experience
experience.halliburton.desc1: Angular Experience and Certification: Completed an intensive Angular course on Udemy and obtained the corresponding certification, establishing a solid technical foundation that boosted the development of innovative web applications.
experience.halliburton.desc2: Creation of Cost Efficiency Dashboards: Developed dynamic dashboards to monitor and analyze non-productive time (NPT), supporting data-driven strategies to reduce operational costs.
experience.halliburton.desc3: Agile Methodologies: Employed agile practices to deliver scalable, high-quality solutions aligned with Landmark Software & Services' strategic objectives.
experience.enactus_hackathon.desc1: Developed the "STEMify" app in Swift for iOS: an inclusive solution guiding undecided youth towards STEM careers through guided curiosity, gamification, and role model inspiration; recognized with second place in the best solution challenge proposed by Bosch.
experience.enactus_hackathon.desc2: Scalable Educational Architecture: Implemented geolocation with CoreLocation and MapKit, web scraping of universities, Firestore integration, and custom flows; highlighted for its social impact, accessibility, and UX approach focused on vocational exploration.
experience.enactus_challenge.desc1: Development of the "Cultivo Sano" (Healthy Crop) app in Swift for iOS: Led the development of an application that empowers rural communities through computer vision for early detection of plant diseases; project aligned with the SDGs and awarded on the challenge podium.
experience.enactus_challenge.desc2: Diagnostic Efficacy: Trained a robust detection model with over 10,000 plant images, achieving 87% accuracy and reducing diagnosis time by 60% compared to traditional methods.
